Rulings.Edison:
●The Condition can't be negated.
●The Summon Effect does not start a chain.
●This card must first be Special Summoned from the hand by the effect.
●Once properly Summoned, this card can be Special Summoned from the GY / removed from play.
●The ●Removing from play 1 DARK monster is a cost.
●This effect targets 1 DARK monster in your GY.
Rulings.Tengu:
(C) This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. (S) This card can only be Special Summoned, by having 5 or more DARK monsters in your GY while you control no monsters. (1) Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 DARK monster from your GY to Special Summon 1 DARK monster from your GY.
●The (C) Condition cannot be negated.
●The (S) Summon Effect does not start a chain.
●This card must first be Special Summoned from the hand by the (S) effect.
●Once properly Summoned, this card can be Special Summoned from the GY / removed from play.
●The (1) Ignition Effect activates & resolves on the field.
●Removing from play 1 DARK monster is a cost.
●This effect targets 1 DARK monster in your GY.

PSCT.Base: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 5 or more DARK monsters in your Graveyard while you control no monsters.
